mapper.select: SELECT cust_relation FROM loan_customer WHERE id = #{id}
select b.* from loan_customer b where b.principal_cust_id =( select a.loan_customer_id from loan_order a where a.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and b.`status` =0 and b.cust_type != 4

select
from loan_customer where id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='0'
